mapper.select: SELECT point_minus_code AS pointCode ,user_id AS userId ,point_minus AS pointAmount ,point_state AS pointState ,point_minus_date AS pointDate ,point_minus_reason AS pointReason ,'차감' AS pointSaveOrMinus FROM point_minus AS pm WHERE user_id = #{loginId} AND point_minus_delete_state = 'N' UNION SELECT point_save_code AS pointCode ,user_id AS userId ,point_save AS pointAmount ,point_state AS pointState ,point_save_date AS pointDate ,point_save_reason AS pointReason ,'지급' AS pointSaveOrMinus FROM point_save AS ps WHERE user_id = #{loginId} AND point_save_delete_state = 'N' ORDER BY pointDate;
